dcterms:description: A dataset for training and evaluating models for reading comprehension and summarization, consisting of news articles and their corresponding summaries.
dcterms:title: CNN/Daily Mail dataset (CNN/DM)

dcterms:creator: Shashi Narayan

dcterms:description: A dataset designed for extreme summarization, focusing on generating concise summaries from long articles.
dcterms:title: Extreme Summarization dataset (XSUM)
